ModMetaData.name: Misc. Robots Xtension
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** You must load Miscellaneous CORE first for this to work without errors! *** *** You must also load Misc. Robots first for this to work at all! ***
-GardenerBot (working template) This robot is a working template for you to add your own robots. Unmodified this is a robot that cuts down plants! It does not plant in this variant!
1. Replace GardenerBot with whatever you want it to be 2. Change the workTypeDef and workTag number in the AIRobot_Races.xml 3. Replace the graphics with your graphic set
(Version: 0.14.1)
